alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lexington, north central Aiken and southeastern Saluda Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Batesburg-Leesville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Batesburg-Leesville, Gilbert, Summit, Monetta, Cedar Grove Fire Station, Fredonia, Murray, Camp Kinard, Delmar, Hibernia, Kneece, Samaria Fire Station and South Shore Marina. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 37 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
